(4955x243+287)/64 mod 128 = 2. (4955x243+287)/128 mod 64 = 1. (4955x729+989)/256 mod 32 = 2. (4955x729+989)/512 mod 16 = 1. (4955x2187+3479)/1024 mod 8 = 2. (4955x2187+3479)/2048 mod 4 = 1. (4955x6561+12485)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (4955x6561+12485)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
